thread.title: IAG confident on outlook but Q4 disappoints

title: IAG confident on outlook but Q4 disappoints
text:
IAG confident on outlook but Q4 disappoints 1:59pm GMT - 01:12 
British Airways owner-IAG expects to post higher profits this year after growing them 19 percent in 2017, as it said it would return an extra 500 million euros to shareholders, such is its confidence in its future performance. But as Kate King reports, investors aren't so sure in the outlook. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
